name: Lic
0:
”Alexa, turn on the lamp”
”Alexa, turn on the living room lights”
”Alexa, set the lamp to warm white”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Through Alexa and Lic to control your sunlight lights, you can control lights, rooms, scene mode and linkage. First, select the Lic skills in Alexa, click the "start skill" button to connect your sunshine lighting account, and now you can start to control your device. Because temporary passwords are required when the account is connected, we need to install our app.The name of our app is Lic. If you can't find it, you can try to search Lic Lighting.
